Pdf neuron close to tritocerebrum.Develops_directly_from: pupal Pdf neuron close to tritocerebrum
Pdf neuron close to tritocerebrum.Definition: Neuron located anteroventrally to the tritocerebrum that expresses Pdf (FBgn0023178) strongly until 24hrs after eclosion, after which Pdf immunoreactivity in the soma disappears. Within 2-4 days post-eclosion, Pdf immunoreactivity is also lost from the arborizations.
